'''Mallow Wood "Sturdy" Cargo Container''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Mallow Wood "Sturdy" Cargo Container is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Fontaine]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in the [[Abandoned Production Zone]]'s Supply Warehouse 2, and must be unlocked using the Multidirectional Connection Control Drive Valve.
<gallery>
Item Mallow Wood Sturdy Cargo Container Location.png|Map location
Item Mallow Wood Sturdy Cargo Container Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Mallow Wood = 6
|Iron Chunk = 2
|sort = Mallow Wood;Iron Chunk
}}
